title: The Girl from Jakarta
description: 17 year old Cindy is a half English, half Indonesian girl. Her amazing talent for football takes her from the rural poverty of Yogyakarta, Indonesia to become the first female to play in the Men's English Premier League. Along the way to stardom she fights racism and sexism, falls in and out of love, and has to decide which country to represent as the World Cup finals approach.
author: Hester Keegan
